code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{doc,getDoc}from'firebase/firestore';import{db}from'../firebaseConfig';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AccountPage=()=>{const{currentUser,logout}=useAuth();const[userData,setUserData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchUserData=async()=>{if(currentUser){const docRef=doc(db,'users',currentUser.uid);const docSnap=await getDoc(docRef);if(docSnap.exists()){setUserData(docSnap.data());}}};fetchUserData();},[currentUser]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-md mx-auto bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center",children:"Account Details"}),userData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-semibold",children:"First Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:userData.firstName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-semibold",children:"Last Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:userData.lastName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-semibold",children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:userData.email})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-8 flex flex-col space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,className:"w-full bg-highlight text-white py-2 px-4 rounded hover:bg-opacity-90",children:"Logout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"w-full bg-red-500 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded hover:bg-opacity-90",children:"Delete Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"w-full bg-blue-500 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded hover:bg-opacity-90",children:"Refer a Friend"})]})]});};export default AccountPage;
